title: The speech spoken to the Lord General Monck at Goldsmiths-Hall April the tenth, 1660. / By Walter Yolkney.
author: Yolkney, Walter.
notes: Attributed by Wing to Thomas Jordan, and not to Walter Yolkney.
Verse - "VVe have layn under Hatches many years,".
Identified as Wing (2nd ed.) Y35 on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700", reel 2124.3.
L Copy stained at foot with loss of text.
Reproduction of the originals in the British Library.
